name: Do or Dice
description:
Do or Dice

What do you need to win at a casino?  

1. Luck 

2. More luck 

3. Even more luck. 

The odds are stacked against you, so why not cheat? Getting away with it seems easier than winning. Increase your chances of winning, and get out of the casino! I'ts Do or Dice!

Gameplay:

*Use dice to strategically increase your odds and decrease the odds of your opponent. 

*The blue dice can influence your own odds.

*The red dice can influence the odds of your opponent.

*The white dice can influence either you or your opponents odds.

Controls: 

*Move with mouse

*Left click to interact.

Contributors:

*Programming by Erwin Arends.

GMTK Game Jam 2022 submission under the theme: Roll of the Dice
